business.headline: Jeff Bezos denies Musk's claim on Tesla stock advice: '100% not true'Elon Musk said on social media platform X that Bezos had advised people to sell their Tesla and SpaceX shares, predicting Donald Trump's electoral defeat.

Byju's founder told US ally to flee the US to avoid testifying: ReportThe businessman, William R. Hailer, testified before US Bankruptcy Judge John T. Dorsey, alleging that Byju Raveendran offered him a lucrative job and sent him a $10,700 plane ticket to Dubai just two days before he was scheduled to testify.

Sensex ends nearly 2,000 points higher, Nifty above 23,900A broad-based recovery in information technology (IT), financial, banking and energy stocks spearheaded the recovery. A sharp rebound in Adani Group stocks also added to the positive momentum.
Sensex surges 2,000 points, Rs 7 lakh crore added: 4 key factors behind rallyThe Sensex was up 2039.44 points to 79,195.23 at 2:57 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 587.90  to 23,938.75.

Bitcoin hits record high, within touching distance of $100,000 milestoneThe world's leading cryptocurrency topped $99,300, coming within striking distance of the psychological milestone that many experts had anticipated after the US election results.

Sensex jumps 1,200 points: 3 things to know about today's stock market bull runThe BSE Sensex climbed 1,193.90 points to cross 78,340.07, while the NSE Nifty advanced 371.50 points to reach 23,721.40.

Sensex jumps over 1,000 points as most Adani Group stocks rebound sharplyStock market today: The S&P BSE Sensex climbed 1,034.76 points to 78,190.55 by 12:42 pm, while the NSE Nifty50 gained 329.15 points to reach 23,679.05.

On the Bombay Stock Exchange (BSE), the stock opened at Rs 279.05, reflecting a 2.22% premium.

Ola Electric layoffs: 500 employees likely to lose jobs amid restructuringOla Electric Layoffs News: The move aims to streamline operations, eliminate redundant roles, and enhance profitability. The restructuring process, which began months ago, is expected to conclude by December 2024.

Kenya cancels $700 million deal with Adani Group after US chargesKenya has terminated a $700 million agreement with the Adani Group following a US indictment.

Kenya cancels $730 million proposed deals with Adani Group after US indictmentKenyan President William Ruto has ordered the cancellation of several proposed deals with the Adani Group after the US indicted industrialist Gautam Adani in a bribery case.

entertainment.headline: House of cards actor Kevin Spacey given bail, what happens to #metoo now?From American Beauty to House of Cards, one of the most lauded actors of his generation, Kevin Spacey has a tainted reputation. In a new turn, the Oscar-winning actor "strenuously" denied allegations of sexual assault against him and got bail. Watch to know more

Images of Nayantara wearing sandals inside Tirupati temple sparks outrage against newlywed coupleAfter the grand wedding between Nayantara and Vignesh, the couple went to the Tirupati temple to offer prayers.

However, images of Nayantara wearing footwear inside the temple area has sparked outrage among the devotees against the couple.

While Vignesh was spotted walking barefoot, Nayantara was seen wearing sandals, which caused a massive uproar amongst devotees in the area.

Temple authorities issued a clarification saying it was permitted for devotees to wear footwear in that area.

Cannes Film Festival 2022: Deepika, Aishwarya walk the red carpet; Indian pavilion inauguratedThe 75th annual Cannes Film Festival began on May 17. Aishwarya Rai Bachchan and Deepika Padukone walked the red carpet on Day 3 of the 10-day film festival. 

On the second day, May 18, Union Minister for I&B, Youth Affairs & Sports, Anurag Thakur, inaugurated the India Pavilion at the Cannes Film Festival. The special event was also attended by several Indian celebrities, including Deepika Padukone, R. Madhavan, Nawazuddin Siddiqui, Tamannaah Bhatia and others.

Deepika Padukone, who is part of the Cannes 2022 jury, talked about Indian films at the event and said that she believes there will be a day when Cannes will be in India.
Disco king Bappi Lahiri passes away at 69 Singer-composer Bappi Lahiri passed away on Wednesday, February 16, at a Mumbai hospital. He was 69.

Andheri court summons Shilpa Shetty, Shamita, their mother Sunanda The Andheri court has issued summons to Bollywood actress Shilpa Shetty, her sister Shamita and their mother Sunanda over non-repayment of loan.

general news.headline: Eknath Shinde or Devendra Fadnavis, who will Mahayuti pick as CM?The Maharashtra Assembly election results show Mahayuti sweeping the polls. The big question now is who the NDA will make the Maharashtra Chief Minister. Will it retain Eknath Shinde, who has won over the voters as CM, or make Devendra Fadnavis, who led BJP's stellar performance, the Chief Minister?

1st Test Day 2 Live: Rahul, Rahul, Jaiswal take India's lead to 130 at TeaAUS vs IND, 1st Test Day 2 Live Updates and Reactions: Yashasvi Jaiswal and KL Rahul have extended India's lead to 130 in the second innings. Both batters have looked at ease as the Australians have struggled to make any breakthrough despite using six bowlers, including Marnus Labuschagne.

Not possible: Sanjay Raut questions Maharashtra result after MVA drubbingEarly trends show the Mahayuti alliance leading in 221 seats, leaving the opposition Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA) trailing far behind with a lead in just 52 seats.

Live: Debutante Priyanka Gandhi leads by over 3.4 lakh votes in WayanadWayanad election result live: The by-election in Wayanad was held on November 13, 2024. In the Wayanad bypolls, Priyanka Gandhi Vadra is leading with 4,81,689 votes, while her rival Sathyan Mokeri has secured 1,62,490 votes. This gives Priyanka Gandhi a lead of 3,19,199 votes as the race continues. Both candidates focused on development and grassroots initiatives, appealing to rural and urban voters. The Wayanad election has drawn attention for its potential impact on the region's political landscape. Follow India Today for the latest updates regarding Wayanad bypolls.

Mere Karan Arjun aayenge: But, will they be welcomed by Gen Z?The re-release of the iconic film Karan Arjun has generated excitement with both millennials and Gen Z eager to witness the legendary duo of Shah Rukh Khan and Salman Khan on the big screen once more. With its unforgettable dialogues and timeless appeal, the film continues to captivate audiences across generations.

LIVE: Mahayuti set for landslide win in Maharashtra, ahead in over 200 seats Maharashtra Assembly Election Results 2024 Live: The Mahayuti alliance, comprising the BJP, Shiv Sena, and NCP, is set for a landslide victory in Maharashtra. All alliance partners have showcased an impressive performance, according to the trends, with their lead crossing over 200 out of the 288 seats. Meanwhile, the Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA), which includes the Congress, Shiv Sena (UBT), and NCP (SP), is limited to just around 50-60 seats, marking a massive setback. The exit polls had predicted a close fight with a slight edge for the Mahayuti. However, the current trends indicate a resounding victory for the NDA. Stay tuned to IndiaToday.in for the latest results and updates as the counting progresses in Maharashtra.

Adani row: What the Azure whistleblowers flagged in the alleged bribery scandalFormer Azure executives, along with business tycoon Gautam Adani, have been named in unsealed court documents by the US Attorney for the Eastern District of New York and the FBI.

Worli LIVE: Aaditya Thackeray takes lead again in tight fight with Milind DeoraWorli Assembly Election Results 2024 Live: Worli witnesses a three-way contest between Chief Minister Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena's Rajya Sabha MP Milind Deora, Shiv Sena (UBT)'s Aaditya Thackeray, and Maharashtra Navnirman Sena (MNS) candidate Sandeep Deshpande. Mahayuti candidate Deora, who quit the Congress and joined the Shinde Sena earlier this year, is hopeful of wresting the seat from MVA's Aaditya Thackeray, the son of Uddhav Thackeray and the current MLA from Worli. MNS's Deshpande is also optimistic about a surprise in this high-profile seat. Stay tuned to India Today as we bring you all the latest updates from Worli as the Maharashtra Assembly election counting progresses.

Yeh Kaali Kaali Ankhein 2 review: Tahir Raj Bhasin is brilliant in thrilling seriesReleased-Fri Nov 22, 2024Yeh Kaali Kaali Ankhein 2, a sequel to the popular series, continues the thrilling narrative with new twists and challenges for its characters. The show keeps viewers engaged with its intense storyline and strong performances, particularly by Tahir Raj Bhasin.

Thank you, ladli behena, kisan: Eknath Shinde after NDA landslide in MaharashtraElection Commission trends show Mahayuti is leading in 218 seats in the 288-member Assembly, with the opposition Maha Vikas Aghadi (MVA) trailing far behind with a lead in 56 seats.

What's behind the rise of pre-draped sarees in IndiaWearing a saree no longer demands the patience to carefully wrap it around your body, create precise pleats, and perfectly drape the pallu before stepping out to slay - thanks to the advent of pre-draped sarees.

NDA's strong show in Vidarbha, Maharashtra gamechanger, after Lok Sabha blowMaharashtra election results 2024: The BJP-led Mahayuti has taken a massive lead in Vidarbha region, which is home to a large chunk of both large- and small-scale farmers, shows very early trends.

Live: INDIA pulls ahead in Jharkhand, comfortably over halfway mark  Jharkhand Assembly Election Results 2024 Live: As the counting of the vote is underway, Hemant Soren-led INDIA bloc has orchestrated a stunning turnaround in the Assembly polls. Defying exit poll predictions, the JMM is on the way to forming a government for a third term, with the alliance leading in nearly 50 seats, way above the halfway mark of 42. The BJP-led NDA is ahead in 30 seats. Voter turnout in Jharkhand stood at 68.45 percent. Follow India Today for the latest updates regarding Jharkhand elections.

Diljit Dosanjh: If you want alcohol censorship in songs, do it for cinema tooIn a new video from his Lucknow concert, singer Diljit Dosanjh highlighted the disparity in censorship rules for films and songs. He also said how singers are easily 'soft targets.'

Mahayuti takes massive lead in Maharashtra, crosses 200 seats in big battleMaharashtra Election Results: The ruling Mahayuti coalition of BJP, Eknath Shinde-led Shiv Sena and Ajit Pawar's NCP is aiming to retain power, while the MVA consisting of the Congress, Shiv Sena (UBT) and Sharad Pawar's NCP, is aiming for a comeback.

Man's high-tea experience at Mumbai's Taj Mahal Palace impresses Internet. VideoA video of a content creator living his dream of having tea at Mumbai's iconic Taj Mahal Palace has charmed the internet.

Jasprit Bumrah runs riot vs Australia with 11th 5-wicket-haul in TestsIndia captain Jasprit Bumrah continued to run riot against Australia on Saturday, 23 November. With the wicket of Alex Carey, Bumrah completed his 11th five-wicket haul in Test cricket. This was also Bumrah's 2nd 5-wicket-haul vs Australia.

Leads are big, BJP has reason to celebrate: Congress's Supriya Shrinate Congress leader Supriya Shrinate while speaking to India Today on the early trends of Maharashtra and Jharkhand polls, said that the BJP-NDA's lead in Maharashtra is big. She said, "If the leads are what they are, then BJP has a reason to celebrate."

Bandra East Live: Shiv Sena's (UBT) Varun Sardesai leads by 5,497 votes Bandra East Election Result 2024 Live: The Vandre East Assembly constituency, that covers Mumbai's Bandra East, is witnessing a fierce contest with Shiv Sena (UBT) candidate Varun Sardesai leading against his rival candidate and NCP leader Zeeshan Siddique. The constituency is a mix of socio-economic groups, including strongholds of the middle and lower-middle class, Muslim-majority areas like Behrampada, and affluent zones in the Bandra Kurla Complex (BKC) business district. The Shiv Sena (UBT) aims to reclaim its former bastion, home to the Thackeray family residence, 'Matoshri,' in Kalanagar.

Kanguva box office Day 9: Suriya's film on a sorry run, no hope leftSuriya's highly-anticipated film Kanguva saw a dismal performance at the box office. The film's second weekend collections don't seem promising, and all the hopes of its redemption at the ticket window seem baseless at this point.

Brad Pitt, George Clooney's Wolfs 2 cancelled, director confirmsPlans for a sequel to the crime thriller Wolfs, starring Brad Pitt and George Clooney, have been cancelled by director Jon Watts. The project, previously under development with Apple, will no longer proceed.

Salman Khan joins Atlee's next reincarnation action drama: ReportSalman Khan has reportedly joined filmmaker Atlee for his next grand two-hero reincarnation action drama. As per reports, the film is expected to begin production in the summer of 2025.

sports.headline: Tahlia McGrath to lead Australia side in women's ODI vs India in Healy's absenceVeteran all-rounder Tahlia McGrath will lead the Australian women's side against India in regular skipper Alyssa Healy's absence in the three-match ODI series next month.

Emergency ICC meeting called to discuss Champions Trophy: SourcesThe ICC is set to mediate a critical meeting on November 26 which will include top officials of both BCCI and PCB, aiming to resolve venue concerns for the 2025 Champions Trophy amid escalating tensions and disagreements over safety, hosting rights, and hybrid model proposals.

NCERT deletes Azad Pak, adds China's aggression reference in Class 12 textbookThe NCERT has made final changes to its Class 12 Political Science textbook syllabus for the upcoming academic year, including a revision in reference to India's border situation with China, Azad Pakistan, Article 370 and more.

NEET row: Bihar cops find 6 post-dated cheques 'issued for question paper brokers'Six post-dated cheques which were suspected to have been issued in favour of mafia demanding over Rs 30 lakh from each candidate seeking alleged leaked question paper ahead of NEET held last month were recovered by Bihar Police.

Forest fires surge tenfold from 2004 to 2017: Causes, impact and preventionAmidst a relentless surge, intense forest fires are now multiplying tenfold, casting a menacing shadow over our flora and fauna. Fresh plea in Supreme Court to recall NEET results, reconduct examsA fresh petition has been filed in the Supreme Court to recall the National Entrance cum Eligibility Test - Under Graduate (NEET-UG) 2024 results and re-conduct fresh examination after discrepancies in the declared results.

NTA issues clarification after NEET result controversy over toppers, high cut-offIn a detailed statement, the National Testing Agency (NTA) said that the increase in cut-off and number of toppers in the NEET-UG reflect the competitive nature of the exam and maintained that the test's integrity has not been compromised.
